paragraphs: Playwright is an open-source automation library developed by Microsoft for end-to-end testing and browser automation.
Supports multiple browsers (Chromium, Firefox, WebKit) and languages (JavaScript, Python, .NET, Java).

title: Key Features Overview
brief: Core capabilities that make Playwright powerful

features.title: Cross-Browser Testing
features.description: Test on Chromium, Firefox, and WebKit with a single API

features.title: Auto-Waiting
features.description: Smart waiting eliminates the need for sleep() calls

features.title: Network Control
features.description: Mock and intercept network requests seamlessly

features.title: Device Emulation
features.description: Test on mobile viewports and geolocations
